thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com
thread.title: Chelsea

author: Chelsea
title: Chelsea
text: Lindsey found the perfect location and the price we were looking for for our honeymoon <3. We have never done a trip like this so Lindsey directed us through the entire process. We tried going through a AAA travel agent and through Costco Travel and he found us our best bang for our buck we feel. The only bummer was I had a $100 off voucher that I forgot to tell him about before booking and by then there was nothing I could do.But that isn't going to ruin our trip! Looking forward to our Cozumel trip in just 5 1/2 months :)
